speaker.whotheyare: Betty Hart advocates for curiosity, diversity, empathy and valuing the whole of a person rather than individual aspects.
speaker.whylisten: Betty Hart is an actor, director, facilitator and woman of faith whose mission is to help create space for necessary, and sometimes challenging, conversations. As a theatre artist, she centers these dialogues around who we are as individuals, who we desire to be as a community and how we can change long-standing behavior to become more than we ever imagined.
